name: Rampage Racing Car Arena
description:
Rampage Racing Car Arena is the most realistic 3D drift racing simulation. Drive the fastest sports cars of the world at extreme speed and feel the asphalt of the track burning! Drive like a real professional racer to leave your furious rivals behind! Feel the competition and speed boost your car to the finish line! Improve your racing and drifting skills. Race to battle the world record of the leaderboard or just for fun in the freeride mode.
Features:
- The most realistic 3D drift racing simulation
- Customizable difficulty
- Realistic simulation of all aspect
- Specific engine sound for every car with turbo whistle and blow off valve
- Backfire effects with sounds.
